meanings.definition: The state or quality of being resplendent.
meanings.sent1: The resplendences of the sunset filled the sky with beauty.
meanings.sent2: The resplendences of the stars shone brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: Her dress sparkled with resplendences, making her the center of attention.
meanings.sent4: The resplendences of the diamond reflected the light in a dazzling display.
meanings.sent5: The resplendences of the garden in full bloom were a sight to behold.

meanings.sent1: The resplendences of the sun illuminated the room with warmth.
meanings.sent2: The resplendences of the fireworks lit up the dark sky.
meanings.sent3: The resplendences of the neon sign attracted customers to the store.
meanings.sent4: The resplendences of her smile brightened up his day.
meanings.sent5: The resplendences of the gemstone caught the light in a dazzling way.

meanings.sent1: The resplendences of the royal crown symbolized power and wealth.
meanings.sent2: The resplendences of the palace left visitors in awe.
meanings.sent3: The resplendences of the cake made it irresistible to the guests.
meanings.sent4: The resplendences of the city skyline at night were breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The resplendences of her outfit made her stand out at the party.
